data.meta_description: Find the perfect Nikon camera for you in 2020 ðŸ‘Œ The best offers and cheap cameras, analysis, and opinions about the Japanese brand.
data.text:
The history of Nikon cameras begins in 1917. The first cameras and lenses were focused on inspection systems. It was not until 1948 when the Japanese brand launched its first analog camera.

From the beginning, Nikon has been known for maintaining its F line for its objectives. This allowed them from the beginning, a great facility to move to the digital world. The compatibility of its lenses for analog cameras with digital cameras has made Nikon one of the reference brands for professional photographers.

This change to the digital world was also marked by the great reputation in the focus of their cameras and the great features they offered. Thanks to these reasons, a large part of photography fans started with this brand in the early years.

Today, Nikonâ€™s strong suit continues to be DSLRs, both full-frame and APS-C. Although a little late, they are working hard in the field of mirrorless. The new Nikon Zs have arrived later than the competition, but their quality promises. With a much wider mount diameter than the competition, it will allow Nikon to develop cameras and lenses with greater light capture.

Learn the best techniques during our Japan Photography Workshops

Cheap Nikon Cameras Deals

Nikon Camera Range

Nikonâ€™s catalog is focused to range from a general consumer to professionals who require the best features. You can find Nikon cameras from a compact with basic functions to next-generation mirrorless. Its greatest offer is found in the SLR market, where you can find everything from low-end cameras to Full Frames with the latest technologies.

This focus on DSLRs leads them to be able to offer a large catalog of lenses. Their quality and their F mount make Nikon a brand where you can improve your camera little by little. You can use your lenses on both a low-end camera and a high-end camera.

Their catalog of compact cameras is not very large. However, their quality lets users know that they are choosing high-quality cameras.

If we talk about mirrorless Nikon, its experience is not as great as Sony cameras. After putting aside their first mirrorless, they are currently launching a new series called Z. The range of Nikon mirrorless cameras that you can find on the market is not very large. By using the Z mount for lenses, they have solved the problem by releasing a wide variety of quality mirrorless lenses from Nikon.

Join our next Spain Photo Tour

Best Nikon Cameras by Category of 2020

Nikon Lens Range

Choosing the best lens for your Nikon camera can be confusing. To give you an idea, its range of Nikkor lenses offers more than 200 alternatives. Before choosing there are several factors that you should take into account, such as the type of photography you want to take.

Once you know the focal range, you will have to understand the technical characteristics. In addition to brightness, one of the most important aspects of choosing a Nikon lens is understanding the focus motor. Some Nikon cameras come with an internal focus motor, so your lens wonâ€™t need to have one. But there are other models that will need your lens to have it built in.

Learn more in our next Iceland Photography Tour

Nikon AF lenses: Without internal motor. You will need your camera to have a focus motor.

Nikon AF-S lenses: With internal focus motor. The most modern Nikon lenses already have this system.

Nikon AF-P lenses: With internal focus motor of the stepping type. All new models are compatible with these lenses. For older models make sure they are compatible.

Buy on Sale the best Nikon Lenses of 2020
